SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 7th JUNE, 1918.
1. The French are carrying out counter-preparation bombardments on the NOYON - MONTDIDIER - VILLERS-BRETONNEUX front.
The village of LEPORT on the AISNE was recaptured. The counter-attack launched with the object of recapturing BLIGNY reached the western outskirts of this village, 47 prisoners were captured and the enemy suffered heavy casualties
2. On the rest of the French front and on the British front there is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
7th June, 1918.
Issued at 6.30 p.m.
For the personal information - of the Minister only. -
